{{Description|The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.}}
'''Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Traveling Doctor]].

==Description==
Even the pitch-black night could not stand between the traveling doctor and her patients.<br>Danger lurks in every corner at night. Those who venture out must be as vigilant as the owl.<br>But unlike the owl, the endless nights without rest eventually took their toll on the traveling doctor, and she fell ill.
